Miniature of Christ in Majesty from an East Anglian MS, the Hours of Alice de Reydon (on the MS, see Image 259). Holding the orb, and with his hand raised in blessing. Christ is seated on a pierced stone bench against an intricately-patterned blue background. His expression is grave and calm
column2: the drapery skilfully conveys dignity and poise. (Toes were not this artistÂ’s strong point). At the four corners, the symbols of the four evangelists.
